title: ICoEdge.IGetCurveParams
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of doubles (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
The return value format is an array of 10 doubles:
retval[0]  X startpoint
retval[1]  Y startpoint
retval[2]  Z startpoint
retval[3]  X endpoint
retval[4]  Y endpoint
retval[5]  Z endpoint
retval[6]  startParam
retval[7]  endParam
retval[8]  sense (Not used)
retval[9]  curve type (Not used)
